attributes.action: When the country gets 0 confirmed cases becomes "National key workers" bank hol.
attributes.additional_details: Unfortunately emergency services will still have to work but with pubs etc being banned then hopefully fewer staff will be needed.
attributes.background: On the day the UK has 0 confirmed cases of Covid-19 we should have an annual "key workers" Bank holiday. Pubs, restaurants and all other services that the government has told to close today cannot open that day. Giving employees a deserved day off but be able to spend the day with family and friends

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307364

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
